title: Simplifying Boolean Expressions
description: Test your ability to apply Boolean laws and identities to simplify logic expressions efficiently.

questions.question: What is the main goal of simplifying Boolean expressions?
options: To make the expressions longer and more detailed
To reduce the number of logic gates needed in a circuit
To convert them to decimal form
